justification: No evidence of Team B’s preferences or urgency is considered. The proposal centers only on Team A and misreads needs: Team A already has a healthy Tier 1 TE (Adam Wilson), while the target (Marcus Garcia) is a Tier 4, questionable TE. Giving up a Tier 2 ascending WR (Torres) weakens A’s WR corps. Rationale is generic and factually off (“major TE weakness,” “high-usage TE”). Trade is feasible but strategically incoherent.
